c74object.name: jam.dmxusbpro
c74object.digest: Connect to the ENTTEC DMX USB Pro interface
c74object.description:
Connect to the ENTTEC DMX USB Pro interface. Conrol DMX data with lists.
The recommended firmware version is 1.44

method.name: blackout
method.digest: Set all DMX channels temporarily to 0
method.description: Set all DMX channels temporarily to 0.

method.name: close
method.description: Close the device connection. If keepsending is 0: Stop sending DMX data.

method.name: devicesettings
method.digest: Read firmware version, breaketime, MAB time and refresh rate from the device and send it out the rightmost outlet
method.description: Read firmware version, breaketime, MAB time and refresh rate from the device and send it out the rightmost outlet.

method.name: open
method.digest: Open serial connection to a device
method.description:
Open serial connection to a device.
Argument: portname[symbol]

method.name: list
method.digest:
An even number of integers, indicating pairs of DMX Channel and DMX Value.
Sets the specified channels to the specified values
method.description:
An even number of integers, indicating pairs of DMX Channel and DMX Value.
Sets the specified channels to the specified values.

method.name: deviceserial
method.description:
Get the devices serial number.
NOTE: If the device is currently outputting DMX data, sending this message will set it back to send mode

method.name: menu
method.digest: Get list of connected devices and build menu from it
method.description: Get list of connected devices and build menu from it.

method.name: receive
method.digest:
Set device to receive DMX messages.
Note: Sending a list of DMX values or sending the message deviceserial will set the device into send mode again
method.description:
Set device to receive DMX messages.
Note: Sending a list of DMX values or sending the message deviceserial will set the device into send mode again.

attribute.name: keepsending
attribute.digest: If set to 0 (default), the device will stop sending DMX data when the connection is closed
attribute.description: If set to 0 (default), the device will stop sending DMX data when the connection is closed. If set to 1 the device will continue to send the last received DMX data after the connection has been closed.

attribute.name: outmode
attribute.digest: If set to 'onchange' (default) first outlet will only send out DMX data if values have changed
attribute.description: If set to 'onchange' (default) first outlet will only send out DMX data if values have changed. If set to 'always' every received DMX package will we sent out the first outlet.

attribute.name: outformat
attribute.digest: DMX data format sent to first outlet
attribute.description:
DMX data format sent to first outlet. If set to 'list' (default) a list of pairs of DMX Channel and DMX Value will be send out. If set to 'raw' outputs the raw bytes of received DMX data:
First byte: Status code. Following Bytes: DMX values.

attribute.name: baudrate
attribute.digest: Set the baud rate for communicating with the interface
attribute.description: Set the baud rate for communicating with the interface. Default: 56700

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.digest: If set to 0 (default), only serial devices following the ENTTEC USB DMX Pro naming convention will be enabled in a umenu connected to the third outlet
attribute.description:
If set to 0 (default), only serial devices following the ENTTEC USB DMX Pro naming convention will be enabled in a umenu connected to the third outlet.
If set to 1 all serial devices will be enabled and more information about the coinnection state will be printed to the Max console.
